name: Be the Ruler: A Game of Britannia
detailed_description:
Divide and rule on Anglo-Saxon England. Make decisions about the state, population, taxes, army, fight with Vikings and finally keep the throne and unity England. And if you do not keep it, then make sure someone will inherit it from you.



Be the Ruler: A Game of Britannia is an advanced historical game in an intuitive setting - be a real king. Make decisions straight from your throne. Remember that your decisions have consequences both for the state and for your dynasty. Make sure that they are well thought out, although there will not always be time for that.
The production combines the best features of Reign: The Majesty, simple to understand gameplay, and Crusader Kings in a setting of historical details with real consequences of your decisions and the development of the dynasty.

Show that the only one king can be in England!
